text: Hi everyone, From what I can find there is now no way possible to create a custom email template with a Drag and Drop system. Or am I missing something?

Hi there! The answer is yes and no.
_(depending on the hub plan as well)._

Yes:
• you can make custom coded modules that can be used in a drag & drop template
• <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/save-your-marketing-email-as-a-template|you can save drag and drop emails as a template now>
No:
• You cannot custom code an entire email and then use the D&D interface with it
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags/dnd-areas|You cannot create a D&D "area" within a custom coded email template>
